title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: An announcer introduces the news over some action-type music

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: This is closed-circuit television for South Park Elementary School. And now, Super School News. News made for students, by students.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Welcome to Ssuper School News. I'm Jimmy Valmer.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: And I'm Rick Cartman.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: The price of milk money will go up next Monday to 49 cents. The school claims the added money is due to the cow shortage in South Park County.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Parent-teacher conferences will be held this Wednesday night, from seven to nine. So kids, get a lot of playing in before you get grounded. And now, for a look at what's on the menu for school lunch today, here's Stan Marsh.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Reporting from the cafeteria, Stan.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Eric, it looks as though the school will be serving a chicken cutlet. Now that's traditionally a uh, a white meat chicken... breast, if you will, that has been breaded, and then cooked. I've been told there will also be tater-tots, and a vegetable dish. This is really shaping up to be a ah ah one fantastic lunch. Eric?

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: ...Hard-hitting reporting, Stan. Thanks a lot. And now, here with the celebrity watch is Butters Stotch. Butters, seen any celebrities?

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Reporting from the sidewalk in front of the school, Butters.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Nu-noo, not yet. I've been standin' out in front of the school for about ...two hours now ah, and I haven't seen any celebrities. Uh about thirty minutes ago I thought I saw Sigourney Weaver, but ih ih turn- it turns out it was a dead horse.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: All right, Butters, keep your eyes open.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Will do.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: More snow for South P... p-p Park. Here's Token Black with the weather.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Jimmy and Eric, it looks like a massive snow storm is headed South Park's way. I asked my dad last night and he said that he heard the snow storm is expected on Tuesday. Guys?

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Kyle Broflovski now joins us for a look at sports. And Kyle, the girls' basketball team just can't get it right.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Another devastating loss for the Cows last night, Eric. They were ahead in the game until Kelly Anderson crying because she missed her daddy, who's on a business trip in Thailand. Uh, Kelly was so upset she couldn't play, and the Cows had to forfeit.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Cows are on a six and O slide since Kelly's father left for that business trip.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: And that's all for Super School News. Enjoy your day at South Park Eh- ...eh- ...eh- ...eh-  ehehehehe  eh- ...Elementary.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: And we're cut!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: All right, nice reporting, guys. Nice.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Boy, that was a GREAT episode!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Yeah, I think that was one of our best shows yet.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Boys, I'm afraid I have some bad news. The school has to cancel your show?

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: What??

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: For God's sake, Mr. M-m-Meryl?

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Well, the students just aren't watching ya. Your rating was only a four this whole week.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: How many students is that?

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Four.  Four students watch your show. And meanwhile, Craig's show is getting a 57!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: ...Craig's show??

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: What is that butthole doing now?!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: O-hoh, it's brilliant! It's all just video footage of animals close-up with a wide angle lens.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Animals Close-Up With A Wide Angle Lens.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: But that's... that's crap! That's not even TV!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: It's what the students want, and it's cheaper to make than yoru show. Just one person and a video camera. Craig is a genius. Uh sorry, kids.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: But, Mr. Meryl, we're trying to bring the news to the students. They need to know the facts, and our news team them, very much.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Kids don't care about the news, boys. It's boring. Kids wanna see animals, close-up, with a wide angle lens.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Please, Mr. Meryl, but, the news is our life. Withot it, we have nothing.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: I'm sorry, kids. Y-y-you should be proud of what you've done. It's just that it's kind of gay.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: ...You're gay!!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Gee whiz. We sure worked hard on that new show.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Apparently it doesn't matter how hard you work.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Hello boys, ready to do some whistlin'?

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Fuck off, Whistlin' Willy. We're not in the mood.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: If you want a pizza, you've gotta whistle. Come on!  There you go!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: God, I wish we had a Pizza Hut in South Park!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Hey look, Craig just walked in.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Yeah!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Hey look, it's Craig!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Hey, Craig, over here!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Geez, and all that from a stupid video show.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Oh hey guys. Heard about your news show being cancelled.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Go play with yourself, Craig.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Yeah, well, I've got an overall deal with the school, heh. They're paying me six dollars a week to come up with new shows.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Your idea took about this much thought, Craig!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: This much more than you had!  Hey, a round of root beers for everyone! On me!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: (Woohoo!)

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Kenny, what the hell are you doing with this asshole??

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: (Craig just asked me to do his show, geez.)

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: You're helping Craig make his show?! I can't believe you would betray us like that?! We've always been supercool to you!  Ah whatever, Kenny!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Hey gang, I brought the new episode of wide angle close-up animals.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Put it, put it up on the, monitors!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Cuuute.  Super cuuute.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Gah, I just don't get it.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Wow, those animals are pretty cute.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Token! Now, come on, guys! We worked too hard to just roll over for Craig and his stupid overall deal. Instead of sitting here feeling sorry for ourselves, we just need to figure out how to make our show better!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Yeah. Maybe if we can get higher ratings by the end of the week, he'll let us stay on the air!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Well, what are we waitin' for?!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Come on, guys!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Student Conference Room 1-F, later. Inside, A sign above the chalkboard reads "Idea Room." Cartman has his feet up on the table. Stan paces the floor.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: All right, we all need to come up with ideas for our show.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: How about we revamp the name? Super School News sounds dry.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: It should be Sexy News.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Action News.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Yeah, Sexy Action, that's good.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Maybe the problem is we don't have very good stories to report on.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Right. We should make up stories, because they'll be far more interesting.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Hey, yeah. Uhwhy I could say I saw celebrities even though I didn't, a-a-and then lie about what I saw them doing.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Gosh, Butters, write that down!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Lie about celebrities.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: We have to appeal to all the students, so we, we need hot girls for the sixth graders...

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: And panda bears for the preschoolers.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Good!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Maybe we need to make students think they have to watch our news show or they'll die.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Yeah! We should make up a bunch of reports about how dangerous it is to be alive.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Oh boy!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Fellas, are you sure all of this ie eh- ethical?

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: We're in fourth grade, Timmy. We don't even know what ethical means.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: All right, Sexy Action School News Team, it's time to go to work. Get out there and get some stories!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Sexy Action School News Team, ho!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Ah, Token, can I have a quick word with you?  Look, Token, I, I know the guys are having trouble bringing this up with you, but uh... Well the thing is, Token, we... we really need to revamp your whole TV persona.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Huh?

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: You see Token, people really enjoy seeing African-Americans on the news... Seeing African-Americans on the news, not hearing them. That's why all African-Americans newspeople learn to talk more... wha, how should I say... white.  Token, all the great African-Americans newspeople have learned to hide their ebonic tribespeak with a more pure Caucasian dialect. There's no shame in it, and I think it'll really help our ratings.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: The announcer introduces the show

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: This is South Park Elementary School closed-circuit television. And now, Time for the Sexy Action School News!!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Is South Park about to explode from a methane gas leak? More on that later. But first, Stan Marsh has a look at some new outfits for the Raisins girls!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Reporting from Raisins, Stan Marsh. He's surrounded by Raisins with shorter shorts and tank tops

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Woohoo! Woohoo!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Eric, the outfits are even skimpier than before, leaving very little to the imagination. No doubt that if I were a little older, I would be aroused.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Woowoo!!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: And now, for a look at the weather, here is Token Black, and Token, I hope there's no tornadoes headed our way.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: No tornadoes, Eric, but interestingly enough, there is a low-pressure storm moving in over the Park County Valley. Should bring us some chilly days ahead.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: The Park County School Board has approved a bigger budget for the computer lab up-

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Oooo, hang on, Jimmy, it looks like Kyle has the jinx on some students' bathroom habits. Kyle?

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Eric, sources are speculating that third-grade student, Pete Thelman , pees sitting down like a girl. We've also got confirmation that Sally Turner stuffs her bra. And Clyde Donovan has only one testicle.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: One testicle!  What an asshole!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Uh oh, looks like it's Panda Bear Madness Minute!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Oh yeah, Panda Bear Madness! And now, let's get a look at the celebrity scene shot, with Butters.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: This isn't the news, this is a tr-tr-tr... travesty.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Student Conference Room 1-F

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: All right, so after my report on the unsanitary conditions of the school cafeteria, we're goin' to Kyle for the story on Brian Teeves trying to make out with Susan Farkle.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Then let's do Token's report on how global warming is going to kill everyone in the fifth grade.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: That is a terrific idea, Stan, A-Okay.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Fellas! Fellas, I got fant-tastic news! The vice-President, Dick Cheney, was in Denver yesterday, and I got an interview with him for our news show.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Oooo, interview with the vice-President, hmmm. Frankly, Jimmy, I don't know how we're gonna fit that in between cheerleader pie-eating and Who's got Skidmark Monday.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: But this is real news!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: It's boring news, Jimmy.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: How do you know?? You you haven't s-seen it yet!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: All right, tell me about it.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Well, in the interview, Mr. Cheney tells me all about how the-

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Aww! Ohh! God, I just got so sleepy. I'm sorry, what were we talking about?

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Look, fellas, I've got a real problem with the direction our news show is going! We're dumbing down the school!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: No, Jimmy, the school is already dumb. We're just giving them what they want.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: We're making the news more appealing to students.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: This isn't the news! This a b-b-bastardized quest for ratings! Damnit, we have a journalistic responsibliltiy to bring students the fa... the facts!  Don't you see what we've done? In our efforts to compete with Craig's small-minded show, we've made a mockery of n-nununews reporting. I remember when we all made an oath to each other, way back when started playing news reporter, that we would never let anything jeopardize our integrity! Well our integrity is jeopardized! And if we can't report news the honest way, what good is n-news reporting?

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Mr. Meryl's office, Audio-Visual Department

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Boys, first of all, I want to tell you how impressed I am with your ability to get more ratings. Your show beat Close-up Animals with a Wide Angle Lens by three viewers!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: All right! Woohoo! Awesome!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: I knew we could do it!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: We beat Close-up Animals!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Oh man, this is sooo great! We, we worked so hard to be on top! Oh, oh come'ere you!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Yes, but unfortunately, you got crushed in the ratings by Craig's new show.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Craig's new show?

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: All the students love it. It's an incredible idea called Close-up Animals With a Wide Angle Lens... Wearing Hats. Take a look.  That Craig is a freakin' genius, I tell ya. He like... an idea machine.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Does... Does this mean we're still gonna get cancelled?

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: I'm afraid it's worse than that, boys. I'm gonna have to give you all F's in Extracurricular AV Class. You have to learn now how important ratings are!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Hey wha-b-but we gave it our best.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Yes.  And I guess your best wasn't good enough .

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: In the hall. Mr. Meryl closes the door behnd them.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: I don't believe it.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: I can't lose this extracurricular credit. I need it to pass fourth grade!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Stupid news hair!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Fellas! Don't you see? This proves my point. We have to elevate our ideas up, not down.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Yeah, Jimmy's right. I know we can come up with way better ideas than Craig.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Yeah. To save our show, all we need to do is come up with the best idea for an episode ever!

text: Student Conference Room 1-F. The kid reporters sit around trying to think of something, anything, but all there is is silence

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: What if we do a show where we go to- Uh, no.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: How about we have us, um... hmmm.

text: Come on, doesn't anybody have any show ideas?

text: Well how about we get panda bears and we have them dance around with us.

text: Yeah! I read 'em all the time! Uh here's one: the uh, snail tripped over a hurdle, a-and the other snail says "Well that's gonna add another hour to his time." Yeah! You guys!  Heh.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: An announcer introduces the news over some action-type music

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: This is closed-circuit television for South Park Elementary School. And now, a Sexy Action News Team Special Report: Cough Medicine Abuse in School!  With the Sexy Action School News Team!  It's the report you can't afford to miss! And now here's Rick Cartman!

Hello, I'm Rick Cartman. Today, the Sexy Action School News Team takes you inside the dark and lonely world... of cough medicine abuse.

text: So where are students getting all this cough medicine??  This surveillance footage shows a group of troubled kids getting all the smack they want from a pharmacist!  Sexy Action School News reported the pharmacist to the South Park police, and he was immediately arrested!

text: Still no celebrities, Eric. Uhn, I'll keep my eyes open.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: The cough medicine problem used to also run rampant in neighboring Middle Park Elementary. But they took action: ridded their entire town of cough medicine, and what we see now is a happier school, 100% cough medicine-free.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Mr. Meryl's office, later.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Boys, I want to congratulate you on what is perhaps the finest piece of student television I've ever seen. Not only did you get all the students and myself off of couch medicine, but you got a 22 in the ratings!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Twenty-two people?? All right!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: You wanted to see me, Mr. Meryl?

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Oh yes, Craig. It appears that the ratings for your show are down significantly.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Gee, what a concidence.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: I wonder... oo-oo.. w-why?

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: You need to know how important ratings are, Craig, so, I'm going to suspend you from school and request that you have your testicles removed surgically.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Haha! In your face, Craig!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: You boys are approved for twenty-seven new shows. I want you to come up with an even better idea than the cough medicine story. Get to it!

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Student Conference Room 1-F, later on. The boys are seated at the table once again, sitting in silence

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Nobody has any ideas?

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: This sucks. I don't wanna keep havin' to come up with ideas for shows all the time. It hurts my head.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Dude, bail?

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: ...I think bail.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: ...Bail.

title: QUEST FOR RATINGS
text: Yep, b-b-b-bail.
